root.name: Puffins: Let's Race!
root.description: Puffins: Let's Race from Other Ocean Interactive. Your favorite feathered fowls from Puffins Island Adventures are back for more fun and mischief. This time your little Puffin is back for the race of a lifetime. Race your favorite Puffin throughout a wide variety of levels inspired by Atlantic Canada. Race through gorgeous red rock cliffs and drift across the slick ice sheets to become the top Puffin in the P500.
